snippet: The Jets said Saturday that they would not exercise their option on running back Chris Johnson, making him an unrestricted free agent next month.
abstract: New York Jets announce they will not exercise option on running back Chris Johnson, who will become free agent in March.
lead_paragraph: The Jets said Saturday that they would not exercise their option on running back Chris Johnson, making him an unrestricted free agent next month.

headline.main: Jets’ Chris Johnson to Be Free Agent
headline.print_headline: Jets’ Johnson to Be Free Agent
